values:
What is this tomfoolery?

And what the hell was wrong with me back in the day? Jesus, I was obnoxious.
I was just really excited to read this article. Typeface Inspired by Comic Books Has Become a Font of Ill Will I've also been playing Pokemon Platinum nonstop. I am a nerd.
This class never used to be this unbearable. Seriously, when did I start hating Art History. A week ago this was my favorite subject. Shenanigans.

Got bored. Went on Flickr. Found stuff I liked. The end.
1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9.

My Uncle Don died in November of a heart attack. He bought a lotto ticket right before he died. My Aunt Charlotte is now rich because that lotto ticket won her $10 Million. And she was on the news. Watch the video, it's really cute. :) I'm really happy for Aunt Charlotte. <3

Dear Brookview Commons + The Danbury Fire Department,
First of all Brookview, I do not understand why you would design a system that would allow for a water heater to FREEZE while people are away, therefore causing said water heater to BURST when the residents come home and take a shower. I do not appreciate standing in the frigid 12 degree weather while you fire men, in your huge warm coats, laugh at the twenty residents standing outside. While it was kind of you to allow us to stand in the lobby, it was not kind of you to tell us at 4 different times that we would be allowed back in our rooms and then take it back. And now that I am finally allowed to "reoccupy" since the pipe burst was on the COMPLETE OPPOSITE SIDE of the building, you are in the hallway yelling loudly about squeegees and electrical wiring. Please return to the other side of the building where the issues are occurring and let me go to sleep.

Good night and good luck.
I hate you all.
- Amanda-Lynn Sousa

PS: You owe me a new pair of moccasins. Mine look treacherous now.



A Side Letter:

Dear Tim the RA,
Thank you for being entertaining. At least I had a few good laughs while my feet slowly became icicles.
Love, Amanda
I'd just like to introduce everyone to my new baby. ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ I haven't named her yet. But she take beautiful pictures.

I love that I'm sitting in the SGA office and could be working on something of importance with Ethan two feet away, but I'm totally updating livejournal instead. It's fine, he thinks I'm doing actual SGA work so I'm not that upset about it.

First of all, can we please discuss how I managed to fit an entire semester's work of photography class into two days? Yeah, I'm awesome. I shot two rolls of film yesterday, developed the film this morning, walked to buy cigarettes while the negatives dried, came back and printed my entire portfolio. I am awesome. And the pictures are actually really good. Mostly of Ted since I shot an entire roll of him walking around Tarrywile that came out wonderful. Critique is Tuesday. Hopefully I pass. Burdick kind of hates me.

I still have two papers to write for Philosophy (Whatever), 80 sketches to do for Figure Drawing (Which will take a day), Puzzle piece design for 3D (Which will take 15 minutes), and a media presentation for Psych (which I will hand in late and I don't really care.)

Should be fine, I'm not that upset about it.

I've been getting random ims from screen names that involve the word Salmon. And I'm bored. So, I googled it. SALMON BOT! Apparently, when you are on AIM and you update your LJ, it links you with someone random who also just updated. It's actually kind of a genius scam. It can also be pretty hilarious. Therefore, I'm totally leaving my screen name in my LJ profile. When I'm bored, I can enjoy the sweet Salmon bot.
this is wonderful. check out eatpes.com. do it. now. kthx.

Work-Related I need a new job. ASAP. This whole three hours a week thing really isn't working out for me. I can't even enjoy all my free summertime because everything costs money, but because I never work, I never have money. So, I sit at home. And waste my life. This needs to not happen anymore. I need money. Anybody know somewhere that will hire someone with literally open availability until the beginning of September? =/ Martini-Related First of all, I need to get on organizing a summer rehearsal. This is going to be a pain in the ass and damn near impossible. But there are some amazing opportunities for us to sing in the late fall, which means we need to at least get together and figure out parts or something. Apparently, the Danbury Cultural Commission or whatever, gave my dad a grant to put on a big deal concert with his group. Which obviously means, Martini is already on the line-up. He's leaning toward November/Decemberish, so we can throw in a little bit of holiday music and advertise it as a big holiday concert. Which means those simple, basic, four part harmony Christmas songs that are tucked in the back of the music files will actually get pulled out. Plus, if we sing a concert in December, our May concert will be that much more pimp. Also, I don't think we'll be able to pull out anything for ICCA this year, but this is the year we are going to buckle down so we actually have a chance to hold our own with the big guys. (BYU Noteworthy, youtube them. Seriously, we sound like crap compared to those girls.) But, I think with the girls we have coming in, plus the return of Brownie, not only will we be covered from our big losses (Miss Colleen and Dima Baby) but we have a pretty great ensemble happening. That's really it, I guess. I spend too much time on youtube. And I love Cat Jacocks. Because I spend all my time with her. And I love Colleen Hermann. Because she randomly appears in Danbury and makes me smile. And I love Stephany Blanchard. Just because. =] Oh, and because she'll be home soon. YAY!

<lj-embed id="3"/>

In other news, I realized today that my favorites list on youtube is 99% a cappella music. I admit, I have an addiction to collegiate a cappella. It's fine. I'm okay with it.

I just stumbled upon this: Top 10 Bizarre Artworks The first one, The Physical Impossibility of Death in the Mind of Someone Living, which I saw in the Met is creepy and weird, but fantastic and being me, I decided to read the wikipedia page about the piece. Apparently, the shark I saw was a replacement shark, because the original was decaying so much. Something about bleach. Whatever. But the greatest part of the entire article, was this line: Hirst's response to those who said that anyone could have done this artwork was, "But you didn't, did you?" Which, not only made me smile, but in five words sums up why I love modern art. The End. But really, check out that link. Those pieces are RIDICULOUS. EDIT: Also, Top 10 Bizarre Mustaches. Because I love mustaches.

alright, let's do some more explaining this time around.

my father is back in hospital. he had another brain attack sunday afternoon when i was home with him. i had to call 911 and it was probably the most frightening thing i've ever had to do. i called my mom at work and told her to come home. and i texted crystal and told her i needed her to come over. my sister was shopping with her friends. so as the ambulance was leaving, crystal came over. and i just avoided my house all day. apparently, he has a tumor in the exact same place as last time. i went to see him today and in comparison to the last time around, he already seemed much better. and he starts chemo on wednesday. which is baby sister's birthday. (yes, we've made the connection that last time it was my birthday, and this time it is her's.) he's convinced he mentally fucked me up, but i'm honestly fine. i'm pretty sure we all knew it was coming, but nobody wanted to say it.

i don't remember if i mentioned that i quit hurcs in here, but i did quit. and at the time, i said it was truly that my heart just wasn't in it anymore. but i think in the back of my mind, i knew my dad wasn't himself. he'd been stuttering more and more and having trouble communicating what he was trying to tell us. i didn't want to admit that i knew it was coming but i couldn't be away every weekend knowing that i could be getting that awful phone call from my mom. so yes, my heart wasn't in it, but i think it was trying to warn me. if i hadn't quit, i would have been at practice and my father would have been home alone and there is no way he would of been able to call 911 on his own. that's not coincidence, i was meant to be home.

sidenote: i know choquette is on my friends list. i don't know what philip told the guard, but i never said anything about the girls being bitchy or whatever. i don't know where that came from. all i told him was that my heart wasn't in it and i felt guilty not giving my all when everyone else was so dedicated. sorry if it got twisted in a different light.

in other news, colleen came up for the baseball game today, but it got cancelled. and she's sleeping at crystal's right now and is spending the day tomorrow. thank god. and terranova will be here tomorrow, and i'm excited about that.

also, i've been practicing driving with jessica and today with her and colleen. apparently, i don't suck. my goal is to get my license by the end of the summer, which will be wonderful. and stephyface comes home next month, which i really need right now.

also also, i'm looking for a new job. bath and body works sucks, and never schedules me. and if my dad isn't working, i need to make sure i have a steady flow of cash to pay for brookview and other things, because i won't be able to rely on him. so, if anyone knows of somewhere that is hiring, let me know.

and yes, i'm fine. i promise. my friends are amazing and i thank all of you for hanging out with me, visiting, texting, calling and everything else. you guys are amazing. seriously. <3

dad's in the hospital again.

yep.

good song.
decent arrangement.

but please watch the vocal percussionist.
apparently, he's not beatboxing, he's playing an invisible drum set.
and when he's not playing his set, he's doing some sweet hip shaking.
i laughed. a lot.

The Basics Gender? female. Sexual Orientation? straight. Single? yep. Would you like to be? whatever. Birthday? october 24th 1988. Age you act? uh, twelve. absolutely. Age you wish you were? twenty-one. i like bars. Height? 5'4" Eye color? they change, like, daily. Happy with it? i loooove them. :) Hair color? blonde/brown/crazy wonderful. Happy with it? mmhmm. Left/right/ambidextrous? rightyy. Your living arrangement? currently, home. as of august 25th, BROOKVIEW 523 with cat and stayce! <3 Family? poppa sous, mama sous, baby sister. Job? the devil. aka bath and body works. hopefully not much longer. Piercings? six. Tattoos? soon. Obsessions? a large number of random things. i'm not listing. Can you speak another language? the most basic portuguese and spanish EVER. Favorite quote? "Art is what you can get away with." - Andy Warhol and "If I should ever die, God forbid, let this be my epitaph: The only proof he needed for the existence of God, was music" - Kurt Vonnegut. Any webpages? nonsense stuff. Deep Thoughts Do you live in the moment? much more so lately. Do you consider yourself tolerant of others? not nearly as much as I should. Do you have any secrets? everyone does. Do you hate yourself? nope. Do you like your handwriting? ever so much. Do you have any bad habits? uh, i smoke. i drink too much. i bite my nails compulsively. i chew on my lip. etc? What is the compliment you get most from people? i don't know. If a movie was made about your life, what would it be called? i have no freaking idea? What's your biggest fear? bridges. amputation. uh, losing my eyesight. Can you sing? apparently. Are you a loner? not at all. If you were another person, would you want to be friends with you? probably not, i'm kind of a bitch. :) Are you a daredevil? occasionally. Is there anything you fear/hate about yourself? there's a few things. but who cares. Are you passive or agressive? i'm..passive aggressive. If you could change one thing about yourself? i'd love to have a greater work ethic and not procrastinate so damn much. There are three wells: love, beauty & creativity. Which one do you choose? love. beauty would be vain and ridiculous, and creativity is just a natural human function. How do you vent? bitch fits. Do you think you are emotionally strong? i'm much stronger than i allow myself to believe. Is there anything you regret doing/not doing? no. Do you think life has been good so far? it's been life. What do you like most about your body? eyes? And least? shmeh. Do you find yourself attractive? sometimes. Are you confident? somewhat. What fictional character are you most like? Dorothy. <3 Do people know how you feel? if you know me well, absolutely. Are you perceived wrongly? probably. Do you... Smoke? yep Do drugs? some. Read the newspaper? new york times. Pray? no. Go to church? no. Talk to strangers who IM you? if i'm bored, sure. sometimes it's entertaining. Sleep with stuffed animals? just liechtenstein. and blanky. :) Take walks in the rain? not really. Talk to people even though you hate them? depends on the level of disdain. Drive? nope. whatever. Like to drive fast? uh, see above. Have you ever... Hurt yourself? this should probably be more specific. like, fell on my face and wounded myself or INTENTIONALLY hurt myself. either way, yeah. whatever. Been out of the country? mmhmm. Eaten something that made others sick? maybe? Been unfaithful? no. Been in love? no. Done drugs? yep. Gone skinny dipping? yep. Had surgery? no. Ran away from home? no. Played strip poker? no. Got beaten up? by my little sister. absolutely. Been picked on? of course. Been on stage? yeah. Slept outdoors? uh, jumpaline tekeathon? Pulled an all-nighter? yeah. What's your record? uh, a couple days. Talked on the phone all night? not really. Slept together with someone of the opposite sex but didn't have sex? yep. Slept all day? yep. Killed someone? oh yeah totally. no? Made out with a stranger? uh, yes..? Thought you were going crazy? always. Been betrayed? not really. Had a dream that came true? yes! Broken the law? haha. daily. Met someone famous? yep. a few actually. Killed an animal by accident? no. Stolen anything? yeah. Been on the radio/TV? yep. Been in a mosh-pit? unfortunately. i hate them. Had a nervous breakdown? it's tradition. Considered a religious vocation? no. Bungee jumped? no. Had a recurring dream? unfortunately. Clothing... Shoe brand? cute ones? Clothing brand? cute ones? but i'm a big american apparel girl. Scent? whatever. Normal attire? jeans. cute shirt. flops. always. Do you wear hats? during the winter. Do you wear make-up? barely. Favorite place to shop? american apparel. and, cute places? Favorite article of clothing? my zebra letters hoodie that tina passed down to me. :) Are you stylish? sometimes. Would you rather wear a uniform to school? there's something to be said about the plaid skirt. but not everyday. Beliefs... Life on other planets? sure. Miracles? yes. Astrology? occasionally. Magic? sometimes. God? no. Satan? no. Santa? no. Ghosts? sort of. Luck? always. Love? sure. Love at first sight? maybe. Yin & Yang? no. Witches? no. Easter bunny? no. Is it possible to be faithful forever? maybe. Is there a pot of gold at the end of a rainbow? no. just dorothy. :) Do you wish on stars? sometimes. but always on 11:11. Love... Do you remember your first love? bah. Still love him/her? bah. Do you consider love a mistake? no. What do you find romantic? cute stuff that actually takes some thought. flowers are lame. be more creative. Turn-on? musicians. accents. intelligence. uh, etc. Turn-off? a bunch of stuff. improper english. using "u" instead of "you". etc. Do you go more by looks or personality? combo platter. Do you think the opposite sex finds you attractive? nope. What is best about the opposite sex? uh, they exist. And worst? ...they exist? What's the last present someone gave you? i don't even know. The last person who... Haunted you? fairfield hall third floor ghost? You wanted to kill? nobody? You laughed at? i believe, amanda and christina at lunch? no! courtney or dima at the baseball game. You went shopping with? uh, i went into walmart with gormley today. Disappointed you? yeah about that... Made you cry? colleen. last day at newbz. :( Brightened your day? every sister of delta gamma phi today. You thought about? colleen. You saw a movie with? cat and fullman. sex and the city! woo. You talked to on the phone? colleen, like, two seconds ago. You talked to on IM? fullman. You saw? dima. You thought was insane? jterr last night. haha. "I AM NOT A WOLF!" You trusted? dgphi. <3 When was the last time you... Smiled? baseball game. or talking to colleen on the phone just now. Laughed? baseball game. courtney is a fool. and dima said halftime. Cried? tuesday. Bought something? today. popsicles and dennys. Danced? uh, last night. next to the pong table. Were sarcastic? uh, 30 seconds ago. Hugged someone? lots of people today. because i saw my siiiisssterss. :) Watched your favorite movie? not for a really long time actually. tina and i should watch wizard of oz soon. Had a nightmare? i don't remember. Talked on the phone? just now. Listened to the radio? i don't know. Watched TV? right now. Went out? well, i went out yesterday at four pm and have barely been home until recently. Helped someone? today i guess. Were mean? uh. always. Sang? like, two hours ago. Saw a movie in a theater? thursday. Said "I love you"? today to...someone? Missed somone? currently. colleen and my stephyface. <3 Fought with a family member? probably earlier. Had a serious conversation? today. Got drunk? last night. Ten Songs You Love 1. "The General" - Dispatch 2. "If U C Jordan" - Something Corporate 3. "Brat Pack" - The Rocket Summer. 4. "Nine In The Afternoon" - Panic At The Disco 5. "We Both Go Down Together" - The Decemberists 6. "Soco Amaretto Lime" - Brand New 7. "That Time" - Regina Spektor 8. "Fire Door" - Ani Difranco 9. "Tonight's Fight" - Forget Paris 10. "Vegas" - Sara Bareilles Nine Things That Make You Smile 1. Stephany 2. Delta Gamma Phi 3. Martini Glass 4. Polaroids 5. Colleen 6. Art 7. Andy Warhol 8. The Wizard Of Oz 9. Summer Eight Things You Wear Daily 1. Underwear 2. Shoes 3. Deodorant 4. Glasses 5. Shirt 6. Pants 7. Bracelet 8. Tank Top Seven Things That Annoy You 1. People who make big deals out of tiny things. 2. People who are talented, and know it. And make sure you know it too. 3. Bath and Body Works 4. Humidity 5. Baby Sister 6. Toothaches 7. People who are incapable of following a tempo. Six Things You're Looking Forward To 1. Brookview 523! 2. Maybe Chicago. :) 3. Seeing Colleen. Ever. 4. Maybe John Mayer. 5. Maybe Martha's Vineyard. 6. Beach, Beach, Beach. Five Things You're Afraid Of 1. Bridges 2. Amputation 3. Not being able to pay for school. 4. Going blind. 5. My future career. Four Favorite Things To Do 1. Summer nights outside with my loves. 2. Shopping 3. Artsy nonsense. 4. Music. Three Goals You Wish To Accomplish 1. Move to NYC with Miss Jacocks. :) 2. Work for The Met or MOMA. 3. Own Jimmy Choos. Or Manolo Blahniks. I'm not picky. Two Things You Wish For In Life 1. Happiness. 2. I don't know. One Thing You Can't Live Without 1. Oxygen. hah.

let's do a re-cap of spring break so far. in plus and minus format! Thursday: + spring break began the minute i tacked up my pieces in color. + A+ on my self expressionism. + A average in the class. + no choir! + mall with stayce! + saw cat j and other people. + DGPhi pasta dinner + reading cosmogirl's expose on what your screen name says about you. very intriguing. - drama type stuff. + jello shots and road beers. +/- tke party. fun, but then i got bored. + roomie times. + cute boy. Friday: + slept forever. + molten java with the crystal. + bought cute 50% off stuff at cvs. :) + saw 9x9x9 again. crystal is wonderful. + cute boy. i honestly don't really remember what happened friday. oops. i got tagged, and i'm in the midst of a mental breakdown. therefore, here we go.

Once you've been tagged, you have to write a blog with 10 random things, facts, habits or goals about yourself. At the end, you choose about 10 people to be tagged, listing their names and why you chose them. Don't forget to leave them a comment or message saying "You're It!" and telling them to read your blog. You can't tag the person who tagged you. Since you can't tag me back, let me know when you've posted your blog so I can see your answers!

1. I hate meeting new people. I will never introduce myself to someone, I'll wait until someone else does it for me. It complicates my life a bit.

2. I absolutely cannot make important decisions on my own. There are a core group of about four people whose opinions I base 90% of my choices on. If I don't directly ask their opinion, I will still think "What would so and so say?"

3. Unlike most people, I know exactly what I want to do with my life. I just don't think I can do it.

4. I'm terrible at keeping in touch with people who live far away. I don't call, I don't write letters, I don't do anything. The only exception is Stephany and I don't talk to her nearly as much as I should. But at the same time I know that even after months of separation and rarely talking to her, nothing will have changed between us. Sometimes that consistency is the only thing that keeps me sane. (Hi Stephy. :])

5. I miss winter guard a lot. I watch guard dvds all the time. They make me smile.

6. I honestly have no idea why I started smoking. I have no idea why I continue to smoke. I also have no desire to quit smoking. I know they are bad for me, but for some reason, I'm okay with that.

7. I actually don't care that I don't have a license. I feel like if I could drive, I'd have the means of running away from things instead of dealing with them.

8. I'm constantly paranoid that my father isn't actually better and that his cancer is going to come back worse than before. Everytime he stutters or has an MRI, I get extremely nervous.

9. I'm terrified of going blind. I'm more afraid of that than bridges. And as everyone knows, my fear of bridges is pretty intense.

10. I get in really self-deprecating moods. Also, I can never for the life of me come up with positive qualities about myself. Even when I'm in the greatest mood ever. (Example: The nine facts above.)

I'm tagging...
1. Colleen
2. Cat
3. Ericar
4. Robert Sniffin, even though he probably won't see this.
5. Molly
...and anyone else who wants to because everyone else I would have picked, Stephany did.


In other news, I have too much to do and not enough time to do it in. I'm going to explode.
